testimonials.title: Client Testimonial!
testimonials.description: Hear what our satisfied customers have to say about their experience with our organic food store.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Quality Organic Food?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust us for their organic food needs.

items.quote: The quality of organic products here is exceptional. I've been shopping here for over a year and never been disappointed. The freshness and taste are unmatched.
items.name: Robert Fox

items.quote: Amazing service and incredible organic food selection. The team is knowledgeable and always helpful. Highly recommend this store to anyone looking for quality organic products.
items.name: Dianne Russell

items.quote: Outstanding customer service and the freshest organic produce I've ever found. The delivery is always on time and the products are exactly as described.
items.name: Esther Howard

items.quote: This organic food store has become my go-to place for all my healthy food needs. The variety and quality are impressive, and the staff is incredibly friendly.
items.name: Cameron Williamson

items.quote: I love how they source their products locally and organically. The taste difference is noticeable, and I feel good knowing I'm supporting sustainable farming practices.
items.name: Leslie Alexander

trustedStore.description: هذا النص هو مثال لنص يمكن أن يستبدل في نفس المساحة. تم توليده من مولد النص العربي لتكوين نماذج عرض النصوص في التصميمات المختلفة.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.warningTitle: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
deleteAccount.warningMessage: Deleting your account will result in permanent loss of all your data.

consequences.title: When you delete your account:
consequences.point1: All your personal data will be permanently deleted
consequences.point2: Order history and purchases will be removed
consequences.point3: Wishlist and shopping cart will be cleared
consequences.point4: You won't be able to recover your account

modal.title: Are you sure?
modal.message: This action will permanently delete your account and all your data and cannot be undone.
modal.warning: You won't be able to access your account or data after deletion!
